console



enum ColorBits: ushort;
Color bits for character attributes. See MSDN for more information about these attributes.

enum Color: ushort;
Predefined colors.

void init();
Initializes colored console output.

void writeLine(Ushort, Char, A...)(in Ushort color, in Char[] fmt, A args);
Writes a colored line to the console.

Params:
Ushort color The color character attributes to write the line with.
Char[] fmt The D format() format string to use.
A args Input arguments for the format string.
